edu.ithaca.iclibrary

Class XMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ithaca.iclibrary.XMLParser

  • public class XMLParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that makes API requests of the IC Library asynchronously.

    • Method Detail

      • makeURL

        public static java.net.URL makeURL(java.lang.String code,
                                   java.lang.String query)
                            throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                   java.net.URISyntaxException
        Given query type and query text, constructs URL for accessing IC Library database
        Parameters:
        code - String, query type. Should be one of the following codes (but probably not GKEY) isbn:isbn, TALL:title, GKEY:key, SKEY:subject, NKEY:author
        query - String, query text.
        Returns:
        URL object
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException, - URISyntaxException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.net.URISyntaxException

        Parameters:
        is: - InputStream to convert to String
        Returns:
        String format of InputStream contents

        public static java.lang.String getText(XmlPullParser parser)
                                throws XmlPullParserException,
                                       java.io.IOException
        Pulls text from the XML parser's current tag.
        Parameters:
        parser: - the in-use XmlPullParser in which the current tag's text is desired
        Returns:
        either a String or null
        Throws:
        XmlPullParserException
        java.io.IOException

      • readMaterial

        public static Material readMaterial(XmlPullParser parser)
                             throws XmlPullParserException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Constructs a Material object from a nested group of XML tags as determined by the format of the IC Library's HTTP response.
        Parameters:
        parser: - in-use XmlPullParser at the tag that groups inner tags pertaining to one item
        Returns:
        Material object
        Throws:
        XmlPullParserException
        java.io.IOException

      • parseXML

        public static java.util.List<Material> parseXML(java.io.InputStream in)
                                         throws XmlPullParserException,
                                                java.io.IOException
        Parses XML in InputStream (from doInBackground).
        Parameters:
        in: - InputStream from HttpUrlConnection response
        Returns:
        List of items found
        Throws:
        XmlPullParserException
        java.io.IOException

      • getMaterialsFromLibrary

        public static java.util.List<Material> getMaterialsFromLibrary(java.net.URL url)
        Makes HTTP request at url and sends response to parser functions,
        Parameters:
        url: - URL constructed using IC Library API.
        Returns:
        List of found Materials, or an empty list if anything goes wrong.
